channel.title: How to make a dialogue
channel.description:
How would I make a button open a dialogure where you could type text?
Like old runescape right-click x then amount dialogue comes up, how would I make it do that but a button?

item.title: How to make a dialogue
item.dc:creator: @ggallin ggallin
item.description:
@ggallin wrote:

Youâ€™d want to google a tutorial on interfaces. Note that adding an interface is always risky for a beginner so find the most basic tutorial possible and work your way up from there. A tutorial on google should probably be under the keywords (java, interface, beginner, help, tutorial).
